long_description: Combining ultralight carbon construction with a Shimano 105 drivetrain, the Cannondale Synapse Carbon 5 Compact road bike emphasizes comfort with relaxed positioning for demanding endurance rides. Synapse carbon frame features optimized tube shaping to promote efficiency and comfort; frame geometry gives a more upright position than more race-oriented road frames. The rear part of the frame and the all-carbon fork feature the Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology for damping road vibration. FSA Gossamer Pro compact crankset is paired with an 11-28 tooth cassette for a capable gear range; BB30 bottom bracket enhances stiffness for efficient power transfer. Shimano 105 levers and derailleurs supply precise, dependable shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. Shimano RS-11 wheelset is decked out with fast Prolongo Kappa Evo folding tires for excellent handling and speed. Pedals not included. Specs on the Cannondale Synapse Carbon 5 Compact road bike are subject to change.
